summary: The diff implements the vast majority of the 11 requirements (REQ-11 through REQ-21). Most sections are added or updated correctly: Hero, Problem, Services, Pricing, Case Studies, Testimonials, About, Why Choose, Strategy Call, Navigation, and global animations. A few minor gaps exist: the Navigation is missing a 'Home' link, the trust badge counters for 'Limited Client Slots' and 'Serving Global Sellers' lack numeric count-up animations, and the step connector is placed between all sections rather than only the specified Problem to Strategy Call pathway.

missing_requirements.requirement: Navigation bar should include a 'Home' link in addition to About, Services, Pricing, Case Studies, Testimonials, and Book Call.
missing_requirements.reason: The navLinks array in Navigation.tsx only contains About, Services, Pricing, Case Studies, and Testimonials. There is no labeled 'Home' nav link. The logo click scrolls to hero but does not constitute a nav link.

missing_requirements.requirement: Three animated trust badge counters below the buttons with animated count-up or reveal: 'Limited Client Slots', '12+ Years Experience', 'Serving Global Sellers'.
missing_requirements.reason: HeroSection.tsx only applies useCountUp to yearsCount for '12+ Years Experience'. 'Limited Client Slots' and 'Serving Global Sellers' do not have numeric count-up values and appear to be static text badges.

hallucinated_features.description: SectionConnector elements are placed between every adjacent section pair on the page, not just between the four specified conversion sections.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-21 specifies an animated visual pathway connecting Problem, Services, Pricing, and Strategy Call sections only. The implementation in App.tsx places SectionConnectors between all nine section transitions including Hero, Case Studies, Testimonials, About, and Why Choose.
